# This file is autogenerated
title: loginWithOauth
description: Overview of the loginWithOauth method
slug: wallets/reference/alchemy/signer/classes/AuthClient/loginWithOauth
---

Authenticates a user using OAuth provider.

## Import

```ts
import { AuthClient } from "@alchemy/auth";
```

## Usage

```ts
const authSession = await authClient.loginWithOauth({
  type: "oauth",
  authProviderId: "google",
  mode: "popup",
});
```

## Parameters

### params

`LoginWithOauthParams`

- The OAuth authentication parameters

## Returns

`Promise<AuthSession>`
Promise that resolves to an auth session instance
